actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Patrick J. Griffin in Lyndon H. LaRouche, Jr. and The LaRouche Campaign v. Donald T. Regan, Secretary of the Treasury.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent a named Senate employee in Lyndon H. La Rouche, Jr. and The La Rouche Campaign v. Donald T. Regan, Secretary of the Treasury.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Patrick J. Griffin in Lyndon H. LaRouche, Jr. and The LaRouche Campaign v. Donald T. Regan, Secretary of the Treasury.
